outline.ch:
課程概述：
本課程為研究生設計，旨在介紹資訊科技在科學教育中的應用。在課程中，將選取數個資訊科技在科學學習與教學中的重要議題作為課堂討論的主題。修讀此課程的學生需完成一篇有關資訊科技在科學教育中應用的文獻回顧。此外，學生預期需在學期末完成一份研究計劃書。
課程目標：
1.了解資訊科技在科學教育應用中的重要議題。
2.培養提出研究計劃的能力，其中將使用資訊科技來支持科學學習與教學。
教學內容：
第1週：導論
第2週：探究與科學教育 (1)
第3週：探究與科學教育 (2)
第4週：科技強化科學學習與教學的理論基礎 (1)
第5週：科技強化科學學習與教學的理論基礎 (2)
第6週：科技強化科學學習與教學的理論基礎 (3)
第7週：互聯網與科學學習
第8週：動畫與科學學習
第9週：文獻回顧（報告）
第10週：模擬與科學學習 (1) phET
第11週：模擬與科學學習 (2) Stellarium, Kstars
第12週：微型資料收集系統 (MBL) 與科學學習
第13週：遠程實驗室
第14週：虛擬實境與科學學習
第15週：擴增實境與科學學習
第16週：科技支持的科學評估
第17週：基於遊戲的科學學習
第18週：研究計劃書報告（報告）
outline.en:
Course Overview:
This course is designed for graduate students to provide an introduction to the application of information technology in science education. In this course, several important topics in the application of information technology in science learning and teaching will be selected as the topics for class discussion. The students who take this course will be asked to complete a review regarding the application of information technology in science education. Also, they are expected to complete a research proposal at the end of the semester.
Course Objectives:
1. Gain an understanding of the important topics in the application of information technology in science education.
2. Develop the ability to propose a research proposal in which information technology will be used to support science learning and teaching.
Instructional Content:
Week 1Introduction
Week 2Inquiry and science education (1)
Week 3Inquiry and science education (2)
Week 4Theoretic foundations for technology-enhanced science learning and teaching (1)
Week 5Theoretic foundations for technology-enhanced science learning and teaching (2)
Week 6Theoretic foundations for technology-enhanced science learning and teaching (3)
Week 7Internet and  science learning
Week 8Animation and science learning
Week 9Literature review (presentation)
Week 10Simulation and science learning (1) phET
Week 11Simulation and science learning (2) Stellarium, Kstars
Week 12MBL and science learning
Week 13Remote laboratory
Week 14Virtual reality and science learning
Week 15Augment reality and science learning
Week 16Technology-supported science assessment
Week 17Game-based science learning
Week 18Proposal presentation (presentation)
